longBusinessSummary: Dai-Dan Co., Ltd. engages in the design, supervision, and construction of electrical, air conditioning, water hygiene, and firefighting facilities works and machinery in Japan. The company offers Hot Cure, a hospital room for immunocompromised patients; All-in-one CP unit, a cell culture processing facility; air conditioning system for hybrid operating room; MonoBooker, a system which makes the location of temporary equipment visible; brightness design solutions; CV4D, a Construction Visualizer 4D for field survey support; artificial intelligence solutions; REMOVIS, a building monitoring and management solutions; ZEB, which reduces energy consumption in buildings; and Enefice Kyushu, Enefice Shikoku, and Enefice Hokkaido buildings. It also provides iLac system, a breeding rack for experimental animals; Air Barrier Booth, a cross-contamination prevention system; Karatto Operation, air-conditioning system for operating rooms; air purification and negative pressure unit; sputum collection booth; Lami Flowrack system; and Barrier Smart, a room pressure control system. In addition, the company offers WIT WET, vaporization type humidification system; air filter regeneration; airflow analysis solutions; quick covers; lightweight reinforced ducts; heat storage tanks; Virtual Duct Clean Room system; FlowSmart technology; Cushion Ducky, an anti-corrosion technology; and anticorrosion diagnostic technology. Dai-Dan Co., Ltd. was founded in 1903 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
